title: Person of Interest - Finche teaches the machine chess pt. 3
author: Katherine Breed
comment: The single best scene from Person of Interest and probably my favorite bit of dialogue from any show. "I don't envy you the decisions you are gonna have to make. And one day I will be gone, and you will have no one to talk to. But if you remember nothing else, please remember this. Chess is just a game. Real people aren't pieces. People are not a thing you can sacrifice. The lesson is that anyone who looks on the world as if it was a game of chess deserves to lose."
Great screenplay. This is why I love this show.
Most people in the world don't understand that.(
description: The third and final of the chess scenes in which Finch teaches the machine chess in episode S04E11 'If-Then-Else'.
